nodes.text: O-Bin, also known as Bin, was a Teaching Guide at the Learning Circle on the planet of Kegan during the rule of V-Tan and O-Vieve. She was strict with her students, especially Obi-Wan Kenobi and Siri Tachi. O-Bin habitually wore her hair pulled in a severe style back behind her ears, along with a customary brown tunic and black trousers.
